attributes.action: No tax payer funds allocated to the "Festival of Brexit Britain 2022"
attributes.additional_details: The strain on the tax payer should not be increased at a time of serious financial strain to the public caused by the double whammy of COVID and Brexit.  Those who want to fund a "festival of Brexit" can do so from their own, private funds via voluntary contributions.
attributes.background: The Festival of Brexit is a political festival, and should NOT be funded by the UK tax payer, or via any charitable donation.
